achievement_text: Orchestrated cloud data modernization deploying Snowflake analytics platform
Won executive buy-in within risk-averse environment for cloud migration
Built cross-functional delivery team integrating external partners
Implemented VPC AWS Private Link and achieved full InfoSec sign-off
Facilitated rapid AI enablement introducing NLP-to-SQL via Cortex Analyst
Established enterprise data governance classifying thousands of tables
Evangelized Snowflake adoption through showcase for 70+ stakeholders
Pioneered Tableau adoption growing usage to 100+ analysts and business leaders
Strengthened revenue forecasting via predictive model for channel marketing rebate program
Elevated data security posture through BI infrastructure migration
Redesigned executive dashboards and reporting ecosystems for strategic KPIs
Expanded data science integration incorporating R-based statistical modeling into Hadoop clusters
skills_demonstrated: R Statistical Modeling Hadoop Big Data
